alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 2:53AM MST until February 26 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties and Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
